catalog_script_client.name: Update Team List Choices

sys_update_version.name: catalog_script_client_36ad3a5b1bd6a4505e72ebd5604bcbef
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>true</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>set</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Ansible Tower Onboarding Request">b54a9b19db98f300c66571198c961949</cat_item><cat_variable/><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>Update Team List Choices</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) {
	if (isLoading || newValue == '') {
		return;
	}
	//get the MRVS
	alert('running script');
    var team_mrvs = JSON.parse(g_form.getValue('ansible_tower_team'));
	var teams_list = [];
    // Loop through teams to create a team array
    for (var i = 0; i < team_mrvs.length; i++) {
        //check if the the job title matches
		teams_list.push = (team_mrvs[i].team_id);	
    }
	if(parent.g_form){
        parent.g_form.setValue('teams_list', teams_list);
    }
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>e663988</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-02-18 15:50:58</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>36ad3a5b1bd6a4505e72ebd5604bcbef</sys_id><sys_mod_count>21</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Update Team List Choices</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="GTS_OAR_Ansible_Tower" source="x_ibmss_gts_oar_at">0cf0becddb143300c66571198c961991</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="GTS_OAR_Ansible_Tower">0cf0becddb143300c66571198c961991</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_36ad3a5b1bd6a4505e72ebd5604bcbef</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>e663988</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-02-18 23:32:32</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set display_value="Ansible Tower Team">b4208a161b8668d45e72ebd5604bcb19</variable_set><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>
